About Me

BIO

Lester is a web developer with more than 7 years of experience in the industry. Although he has a background in PHP, NodeJS, C#, Android, Swift, Python and has developed applications in .NET architecture, he consider himself as a front-end developer. He works predominantly in WordPress by creating custom applications that his clients can use and maintain easily. He enjoys working and exploring the capabilities of Vue.JS and React.JS frameworks.

Lester is very self-motivated when it comes to work and have a strong detail-oriented mindset. His greatest asset is definitely his ability and passion for learning.
